title: Conversations around the Campfire: an Apple/Palin comparison
body: <p>This conversation originated at work when <a title="Damn Ralph" href="http://www.damnralph.com/">Ralph</a> and I started flaming our resident MacTard developer, Ernie.</p><blockquote><dl><dt>Travis H.  	</dt><dd>*grabs some gasoline*</dd><dt>Travis H. 	</dt><dd>Mac's are the Sarah Palin of the computing world</dd><dt>Ernie B. 	</dt><dd>in what respect, charlie?</dd><dt><a title="Damn Ralph" href="http://www.damnralph.com/">Ralph</a> W. 	</dt><dd>not true...Mac's do not have Tina Fey glasses</dd><dt>Travis H. 	</dt><dd>"we're enterprise ready, we sold an ipod in Russia"</dd><dt>Travis H. 	</dt><dd>also, i heard that the iphone 3g is retarded</dd><dt>Travis H. 	</dt><dd>and that the nano is pregnant</dd><dt><a title="Damn Ralph" href="http://www.damnralph.com/">Ralph</a> W. 	</dt><dd>3g has down syndrome ... get it right</dd><dt>Travis H. 	</dt><dd>you can put EFI in a PC, but it's still a pig</dd><dt><a title="Damn Ralph" href="http://www.damnralph.com/">Ralph</a> W. 	</dt><dd>What's the difference between Ernie on a PC and Ernie on a Mac?</dd><dt><a title="Damn Ralph" href="http://www.damnralph.com/">Ralph</a> W. 	</dt><dd>Lipstick</dd></dl></blockquote><p>I have to pick on <a title="Ern" href="http://ern.tumblr.com/">Ern</a> while I can, I think pretty soon I might be the only developer in the company on a non-Mac PC.</p><p><em>This conversation has been reproduced without anyone's permission</em></p>
bodyArticleHtml:
2008-09-19

Conversations around the Campfire: an Apple/Palin comparison

This conversation originated at work when
we're enterprise ready, we sold an ipod in Russia
